verses.verse: Therefore <WG1352> you are <WG1488> without excuse, <WG379> O <WG5599> man, <WG444> whoever you are <WG3956> who judge. <WG2919> For <WG1063> in <WG1722> that <WG3739> which you <WG846> judge <WG2919> another, <WG2087> you condemn <WG2632> yourself. <WG4572> For <WG1063> you who judge <WG2919> practice the same things. <WG4238>
<WG1161> We know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the judgment <WG2917> of God <WG2316> is <WG2076> according to <WG2596> truth <WG225> against <WG1909> those who practice <WG4238> such things. <WG5108>

<WG1161> Do you think <WG3049> this, <WG5124> O <WG5599> man <WG444> who judges <WG2919> those who practice <WG4238> such things, <WG5108> and <WG2532> do <WG4238> the same, <WG846> that <WG3754> you <WG4771> will escape <WG1628> the judgment <WG2917> of God? <WG2316>

Or <WG2228> do you despise <WG2706> the riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> goodness, <WG5544> forbearance, <WG463> and <WG2532> patience, <WG3115> not knowing <WG50> that <WG3754> the goodness <WG5543> of God <WG2316> leads <WG71> you <WG4571> to <WG1519> repentance? <WG3341>

But <WG1161> according <WG2596> to your <WG4675> hardness <WG4643> and <WG2532> unrepentant <WG279> heart <WG2588> you are treasuring up <WG2343> for yourself <WG4572> wrath <WG3709> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of wrath, <WG3709> revelation, <WG602> and <WG2532> of the righteous judgment <WG1341> of God; <WG2316>
who <WG3739> "will pay <WG591> back to everyone <WG1538> according to <WG2596> their <WG846> works: <WG2041>"

to those <WG3588> who by <WG2596> patience <WG5281> in <WG18> well-doing <WG2041> seek for <WG2212> glory, <WG1391> honor, <WG5092> and <WG2532> incorruptibility, <WG861> eternal <WG166> life; <WG2222>

but <WG1161> to those <WG3588> who are self-seeking, <WG2052> and <WG2532> don't <WG544> obey the truth, <WG225> but <WG1161> obey <WG3982> unrighteousness, <WG93> will be wrath <WG3709> and <WG2532> indignation, <WG2372>

oppression <WG2347> and <WG2532> anguish, <WG4730> on <WG1909> every <WG3956> soul <WG5590> of man <WG444> who works <WG2716> evil, <WG2556> to the Jew <WG2453> first, <WG4412> and <WG5037> also <WG2532> to the Greek. <WG1672>

But <WG1161> glory, <WG2532> honor, <WG5092> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> go to every man <WG3956> who works <WG2038> good, <WG18> to the Jew <WG2453> first, <WG4412> and <WG5037> also <WG2532> to the Greek. <WG1672>
For <WG1063> there is <WG2076> no <WG3756> partiality <WG4382> with <WG3844> God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> have sinned <WG264> without law <WG460> will <WG622> also <WG2532> perish <WG622> without the law. <WG460> As <WG2532> many as <WG3745> have sinned <WG264> under <WG1722> the law <WG3551> will be judged <WG2919> by <WG1223> the law. <WG3551>

For <WG1063> it isn't <WG3756> the hearers <WG202> of the law <WG3551> who are righteous <WG1342> before <WG3844> God, <WG2316> but <WG235> the doers <WG4163> of the law <WG3551> will be justified <WG1344>

(for <WG1063> when <WG3752> Gentiles <WG1484> who don't <WG3361> have <WG2192> the law <WG3551> do <WG4160> by nature <WG5449> the things <WG3588> of the law, <WG3551> these, <WG3778> not <WG3361> having <WG2192> the law, <WG3551> are <WG1526> a law <WG3551> to themselves, <WG1438>

in that <WG3748> they show <WG1731> the work <WG2041> of the law <WG3551> written <WG1123> in <WG1722> their <WG846> hearts, <WG2588> their <WG846> conscience <WG4893> testifying <WG4828> with them, <WG2532> and their thoughts <WG3053> among <WG3342> themselves <WG240> accusing <WG2723> or else <WG2228> <WG2532> excusing them <WG626>)

in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> when <WG3753> God <WG2316> will judge <WG2919> the secrets <WG2927> of men, <WG444> according <WG2596> to my <WG3450> Good News, <WG2098> by <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
Indeed <WG1492> you <WG4771> bear the name <WG2028> of a Jew, <WG2453> and <WG2532> rest <WG1879> on the law, <WG3551> and <WG2532> glory <WG2744> in <WG1722> God, <WG2316>
and <WG2532> know <WG1097> his will, <WG2307> and <WG2532> approve <WG1381> the things that are excellent, <WG1308> being instructed <WG2727> out of <WG1537> the law, <WG3551>
and <WG5037> are confident that <WG3982> you yourself <WG4572> are <WG1511> a guide <WG3595> of the blind, <WG5185> a light <WG5457> to those <WG3588> who are in <WG1722> darkness, <WG4655>

a corrector <WG3810> of the foolish, <WG878> a teacher <WG1320> of babies, <WG3516> having <WG2192> in <WG1722> the law <WG3551> the form <WG3446> of knowledge <WG1108> and <WG2532> of the truth. <WG225>

You <WG3588> therefore <WG3767> who teach <WG1321> another, <WG2087> don't <WG3756> you <WG1321> teach yourself? <WG4572> You who preach <WG2784> that a man shouldn't <WG3361> steal, <WG2813> do you steal? <WG2813>
You who say <WG3004> a man shouldn't <WG3361> commit adultery. <WG3431> Do you commit adultery? <WG3431> You who abhor <WG948> idols, <WG1497> do you rob temples? <WG2416>
You who <WG3739> glory <WG2744> in <WG1722> the law, <WG3551> through <WG1223> your disobedience <WG3847> of the law <WG3551> do you <WG818> dishonor God? <WG2316>
For <WG1063> "the name <WG3686> of God <WG2316> is blasphemed <WG987> among <WG1722> the Gentiles <WG1484> because <WG5209> of you, <WG5209>" just as <WG2531> it is written. <WG1125>

For <WG1063> circumcision <WG4061> indeed <WG3303> profits, <WG5623> if <WG1437> you are a doer <WG4238> of the law, <WG3551> but <WG1161> if <WG1437> you are <WG1510> a transgressor <WG3848> of the law, <WG3551> your <WG4675> circumcision <WG4061> has become <WG1096> uncircumcision. <WG203>

If <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> the uncircumcised <WG203> keep <WG5442> the ordinances <WG1345> of the law, <WG3551> won't <WG3780> his <WG846> uncircumcision <WG203> be accounted <WG3049> as <WG1519> circumcision? <WG4061>

<WG2532> Won't <WG2919> the uncircumcision <WG203> which is by <WG1537> nature, <WG5449> if it fulfills <WG5055> the law, <WG3551> judge <WG2919> you, <WG4571> who <WG3588> with <WG1223> the letter <WG1121> and <WG2532> circumcision <WG4061> are a transgressor <WG3848> of the law? <WG3551>

For <WG1063> he <WG3588> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> a Jew <WG2453> who is one <WG3588> <WG1722> outwardly, <WG5318> neither <WG3761> is that circumcision <WG1722> which is outward <WG5318> in <WG1722> the flesh; <WG4561>

but <WG235> he <WG3588> is a Jew <WG2453> who is one <WG3588> <WG1722> inwardly, <WG2927> and <WG2532> circumcision <WG4061> is that of the heart, <WG2588> in <WG1722> the spirit <WG4151> not <WG3756> in the letter; <WG1121> whose <WG3739> praise <WG1868> is not <WG3756> from <WG1537> men, <WG444> but <WG235> from <WG1537> God. <WG2316>
